Text: Incredible posting....... If I read your description correctly though... why would you re-encode MP3 to FLAC?  There's no benefit and a waste of HD space however inconsequential.

I converted the MP3's back to .wav actually, because I put them on CDs for my personal collection. Then I converted the CD .wav files to FLACs to upload. I didn't do it to upload it here. I did it all for my personal use, then decided to up the whole works here. Enjoy it.
